abstract: These are the colored outputs of an algorithm which generates these fractals, where one billion points are repeatedly and randomly transformed. There are several input parameters to control as well as some alternate methods of generation. The output is greyscale, where color is added by myself in art programs. See [Projects / Fractals in Chapel](./projects.qmd#fractals-in-chapel) for more info.
